infos.value: So close to Hourne Castle and yet...no guards?
Why would the kingdom of Hourne be so ill-defended?
Th-that's...
He's royalty...isn't he? What could he possibly be doing in a place like this?
Strange. No sign of any fatal wounds, as far as I can see...
And yet that face... It bears the peaceful expression of one who has been released from all pain in death.
Come out where I can see you!
Pfft. Just a remnant of the kingdom of Ovis.
I'm Deah.
I'm afraid to say the situation is as sorry as it looks.
Breaking off our siege to call for reinforcements from Hourne was sound judgment. Alas...
As you can see, Hourne is nothing more than an empty husk.
So... What will you do?
What do you mean?
All hope of saving Ovis appears to be lost.
That said... Now that I've had a good look at you, I must say, you are quite charming.
Wh—
Here are your options.
I'll let you choose. Either take my hand...or die by it.
I decline both.
Instead...I shall cut you down where you stand!
Whoa, there! Don't be so eager to die.
There's a few things you could learn from me.
Learn...from you?
I may not look like it, but I only work under Jayden because I have to.
You... You're not one of Rundall's men?
I'm insulted by the very notion! Heindler is where I was born and raised.
Us dragons were chewed up by the bucks, all in the name of allegiance.
Then why don't you fight for your kingdom?
And why do you take part in the tyranny of seizing other lands!?
To be frank, I've no love for Rundall. But...it certainly makes me stand out—with the ladies, I mean.
...What're you talking about!?
Hey, I'm not saying anything bad here. You should cherish your life, don't you think?
You must be joking!
You're refusing my offer, then?
Of course I am! You make me sick to the pit of my stomach!
Oh, is that so? Shame. Then I guess you die, just like your homeland.
